targets.query:
from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
  |> range(start: now(), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "prediction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.pid == "${Pid:json}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /quantile_P/ or r["_field"] == "forecast")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

positive_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${Systems:regex}$/ and r["system"] !~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_stop")

// Define helper function for multiplication
multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))

negative_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
inverted_negative_systems = negative_systems |> multiplyByX(x: -1.0)  

// Calculate total
combined = 
union(tables: [inverted_negative_systems, positive_systems]) 
|> drop(columns: ["system"]) 
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start") 

// Combine and show results
union(tables: [inverted_negative_systems, positive_systems, combined]) 
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "system"])

from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.system =~ /^${Systems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "created") 
|> max()
|> group()

panels.description: Location of the station, determined by the coordinates of one of the systems.
panels.title: Location $lat, $lon - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "prediction")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["pid"] == "${Pid:json}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "created") 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.type != "est_demand" and  r.type != "est_wind" and  r.type != "est_pv")

from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "prediction")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["pid"] == "${Pid:json}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "created") 
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.type != "est_demand" and  r.type != "est_wind" and  r.type != "est_pv")
|> keep(columns: ["_value"])
|> max()
|> yield(name: "max created")

from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
|> range(start: 24h, stop: 26h)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "prediction")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["pid"] == "${Pid:json}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "quality")
|> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.description: Forecast of P50 at all tAheads

targets.query:
positive_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${Systems:regex}$/ and r["system"] !~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
// Define helper function for multiplication
multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))
negative_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
inverted_negative_systems = negative_systems |> multiplyByX(x: -1.0)  
// Calculate total
combined = 
union(tables: [inverted_negative_systems, positive_systems]) 
|> drop(columns: ["system"]) 
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
// Show results
combined

from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "prediction_tAheads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pid"] == "${Pid:json}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "quantile_P50")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field","_value","tAhead"])

panels.title: Realised and P50 at all tAheads - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

panels.description: If the prediction is used for TenneT, an EAN is included. Otherwise (usually) not.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  created AS "time",
  ean
FROM predictions
WHERE
  id = $Pid
ORDER BY created

panels.title: EAN (if any)

panels.description: Relatieve gewichten van het getrainde model. Het oppervlak geeft de *gain* aan, de kleur de _occurence_

SELECT
  api_key
FROM customersApiKeys
WHERE
  cid = $cid

targets.query:
from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "prediction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pid"] == "${Pid:json}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /forecast/)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.query:
positive_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${Systems:regex}$/ and r["system"] !~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
// Define helper function for multiplication
multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))
negative_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
inverted_negative_systems = negative_systems |> multiplyByX(x: -1.0)  
// Calculate total
combined = 
union(tables: [inverted_negative_systems, positive_systems]) 
|> drop(columns: ["system"]) 
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
// Show results
combined |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "prediction_tAheads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pid"] == "${Pid:json}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tAhead"] == ${SpecifcTAhead:json})
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /quantile_P/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

panels.description: Forecast and Confidence. Confidences in the past are of $SpecificTAhead

targets.query:
positive_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${Systems:regex}$/ and r["system"] !~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
// Define helper function for multiplication
multiplyByX = (x, tables=<-) => tables
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * x}))
negative_systems = from(bucket: "realised/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "power")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["system"] =~ /^${PolarityFactorFlippedSystems:regex}$/)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "output")
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_stop")
inverted_negative_systems = negative_systems |> multiplyByX(x: -1.0)  
// Calculate total
combined = 
union(tables: [inverted_negative_systems, positive_systems]) 
|> drop(columns: ["system"]) 
|> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
// Show results
combined |> rename(columns: {"_field":"Realised"})

forecast = from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "prediction_tAheads")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.pid == "${Pid:json}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tAhead"] == "${SpecifcTAhead}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "forecast" or r["_field"] == "stdev")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "forecast", "stdev"]) |> rename(columns: {"forecast": "Forecast"})

  forecast

panels.title: StDev: Forecast and Realised Specific tAhead - $Prediction_name (pid: $Pid)

list.definition: SELECT p.name from predictions p where p.active=1
list.label: Prediction

list.query: SELECT p.name from predictions p where p.active=1

list.definition: SELECT id from predictions where name in ('$Prediction_name')
list.label: Pid
list.name: Pid
list.query: SELECT id from predictions where name in ('$Prediction_name')

list.name: Sigma
list.query: select case $Confidence when 98 then 2 when 66 then 1 when 0 then 0 end as sigma

list.definition:
SELECT s.sid 
FROM systems s LEFT JOIN predictions_systems ps ON ps.system_id = s.sid LEFT JOIN predictions p on ps.prediction_id = p.id 
WHERE p.id='$Pid'
list.name: Systems
list.query:
SELECT s.sid 
FROM systems s LEFT JOIN predictions_systems ps ON ps.system_id = s.sid LEFT JOIN predictions p on ps.prediction_id = p.id 
WHERE p.id='$Pid'

list.definition:
from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "prediction_tAheads")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.pid == "${Pid:json}")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["tAhead"])
|> group()
|> keep(columns: ["tAhead"])
|> distinct(column: "tAhead")
list.label: SpecifcTAhead
list.name: SpecifcTAhead
list.query:
from(bucket: "forecast_latest/autogen")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "prediction_tAheads")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.pid == "${Pid:json}")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["tAhead"])
|> group()
|> keep(columns: ["tAhead"])
|> distinct(column: "tAhead")

list.definition:
SELECT s.sid 
FROM 
	systems AS s INNER JOIN predictions_systems AS ps ON ps.system_id = s.sid 
WHERE (s.polarity * ps.factor) < 0 and ps.prediction_id = $Pid
list.name: PolarityFactorFlippedSystems
list.query:
SELECT s.sid 
FROM 
	systems AS s INNER JOIN predictions_systems AS ps ON ps.system_id = s.sid 
WHERE (s.polarity * ps.factor) < 0 and ps.prediction_id = $Pid

list.definition: SELECT max(lon) as lon FROM systems WHERE sid IN ($Systems)
list.name: lon
list.query: SELECT max(lon) as lon FROM systems WHERE sid IN ($Systems)

list.definition: SELECT max(lat) FROM systems WHERE sid IN ($Systems)
list.name: lat
list.query: SELECT max(lat) FROM systems WHERE sid IN ($Systems)

list.definition: SELECT customer_id FROM `customers_predictions` where prediction_id=$Pid group by customer_id
list.name: cid
list.query: SELECT customer_id FROM `customers_predictions` where prediction_id=$Pid group by customer_id
